title: Rezin-Arte (Epoxy,Resin,Paint,Color,Art) Sea Grass Green Pigment 40 gram Jar
features: Rezin Arte “the original” first of its kind DRY Epoxy Paint System.
Brilliant epoxy color milled with real ground metal, mica and proprietary minerals.
Quick mix formula-dissolves instantly in resin. Mix together and create custom colors
Non-toxic, Zero VOC, no turpentine’s, or other oil-based derivativesNon-toxic, Zero VOC, no turpentine’s, or other oil-based derivatives
MADE IN USA-Shimmering epoxy colors boasts a limitless shelf life
description: The Biggest thing to happen to Resin art world and made in the USA!! Introducing Rezin Arte Luster Pigments first of its kind, Epoxy Soluble Dry Paint No more hassle beating mica powders that will not dissolve. No more paste's that smell like turpentine or other oil-based derivatives. Our quick mix formula instantly dissolves, no turpentine’s, or other oil-based derivatives boasts a limitless shelf life. Rezin Arte Luster Pigments “the original” are rich epoxy colors milled with real ground metal, mica and other proprietary minerals. IMAGINE if you can custom blended Luxurious “moist” pigments that dissolve instantly in your resin. Rezin Arte Luster Pigments are semi-opaque. You can adjust your color and produce varying degrees of transparency. Mix them together to create custom colors! Works with any resin, as with working with any epoxy product use basic safely and clean up measures.
